CTMJAVA_CHECKING_COMPRESSING_CONTROL-M.Description: This job will check and compress the folder and it will rename the existing folder-> JRE_For_Restore to BMC_OLD_File
CTMJAVA_CHECKING_COMPRESSING_CONTROL-M.Command: ls -lrt /controlm/ctm_agent/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE/lib/rt.jar;/controlm/ctm_agent/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE/bin/java  -version;ls -lrt /controlm/ctm_agent/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE_64/lib/rt.jar;/controlm/ctm_agent/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE_64/bin/java -version;cd /controlm/ctm_agent/ctm/;mv JRE_For_Restore BMC_OLD_File;tar -zcvf BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz BMC_OLD_File;chmod 777 BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz;rm -rf BMC_OLD_File;

Mail_0.Subject: "JRE_For_Restore" RENAMED & COMPRESSED IN %%NODEID for %%$ODATE
Mail_0.Message:
Hi Team,

The "JRE_For_Restore" FOLDER IS RENAMED & COMPRESSED as BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz IN SERVER %%NODEID for the date %%$ODATE

Once validated the renamed file will be removed.

CTMJAVA_CHECKING_COMPRESSING_LINUX.Description: This job will check and compress the folder and it will rename the existing folder-> JRE_For_Restore to BMC_OLD_File
CTMJAVA_CHECKING_COMPRESSING_LINUX.Command: ls -lrt /opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE/lib/rt.jar;/opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE/bin/java  -version;ls -lrt /opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE_64/lib/rt.jar;/opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE_64/bin/java -version;cd /opt/ctmagt/ctm/;mv JRE_For_Restore BMC_OLD_File;tar -zcvf BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz BMC_OLD_File;chown ctmagt:controlm BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz;chmod 777 BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz;rm -rf BMC_OLD_File;ls -lrt BMC_OLD*;ls -lrt;exit 0;

CTMJAVA_ROLLBACK.Description: This job will rollback the changes from new folder to existing folder ->  BMC_OLD_File to JRE_For_Restore.
CTMJAVA_ROLLBACK.Command: cd /opt/ctmagt/ctm/;ls -lrt BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz;tar -zxvf BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz;rm -r BMC_OLD_File.tar.gz;ls -lrt BMC_OLD*;mv BMC_OLD_File JRE_For_Restore;ls -lrt JRE_For_Restore;ls -lrt /opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE/lib/rt.jar;/opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE/bin/java  -version;ls -lrt /opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE_64/lib/rt.jar;/opt/ctmagt/ctm/JRE_For_Restore/PAKAI.9.0.00.200/JRE_64/bin/java -version;

CTMJAVA_STATUS_CHECK.Description: This job will check on the current status of the java vulnerability related file system
